replies.body: Number of bots in game:  0
I still miss old dominion and this is just so painful and honest to read
too bad they couldn't just leave the gamemode be. Now it's just as snowbally as all the other modes.
I hope they bring back Dominion and not this nonsense
It was snowbally before.

This is abysmal.  Bot lane was a quintessential aspect of the game and the dueling lane was amazingly fun.
Previously, snowballing didn't happen if your top lost and your bot lane won; your bot would cover your brief point loss and either force a 2v1 to re-capture the lost bot point (and thus a 3v4 top).  Now, it's whoever just makes the dirtier team fight comp, because the points honestly don't matter.

I was really excited to see my favorite game mode coming back, but one game in and I honestly have no more interest.  The games are absurdly snowbally and have genuinely lost almost all strategy in respects to when to push, defend, etc.

Very disappointed, Rito.  Disappointed for never making ranked Dominion.  Disappointed for banning the guy who did make ranked dominion, disappointed for the removal of the game mode, and disappointed for failing to bring it back in a fun way.
there's at least one person that goes bot lane every game still
And they usually lose your team the game since top capture point is all that matters most of the time.
Had teammates in 5 games in a row that just wanted to kill only. I kept trying for top but nope, teammates kept going mid. So i said screw it and went to bed.

> [{quoted}](name=The Troll Patrol,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LZBb2B1l,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2016-05-29T18:50:00.875+0000)
>
> Had teammates in 5 games in a row that just wanted to kill only. I kept trying for top but nope, teammates kept going mid. So i said screw it and went to bed.
 
I know man, is sucks. to win, you need to hold on to two points for the majority of the match. It is hard to do that when 3 of your teammates want to defend the crystal from a Garen(the same people who think Garen is a good ban pick). 

 And it keeps happening. Three more games and I get the team who doesn't know what to do, who to pick and where to go. The run around the map like headless chickens. :/

Its not a bad strat. People always seem to ignore the bottom 2 points. Plus it allows you to get the center whenever it unlocks. 

Had a game where the enemy Zyra, Heimer, and Teemo were camping the top point. We almost made it back when the team finally realized that capturing that point was impossible, and keeping the bottom half of the map controlled was much easier.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaoticPinecone,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LZBb2B1l,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-28T06:31:46.511+0000)
>
> Its not a bad strat. People always seem to ignore the bottom 2 points. Plus it allows you to get the center whenever it unlocks. 
> 
> Had a game where the enemy Zyra, Heimer, and Teemo were camping the top point. We almost made it back when the team finally realized that capturing that point was impossible, and keeping the bottom half of the map controlled was much easier.

This.

Take a champ that can tank and kill minion wave solo. Take crystal, tank wave, take center. Wash, rinse, repeat.

Everyone just wants to kill the enemy champs in this game.
praise be
See, maybe it was all Rito's plan to get rid of bots on dominion and make people play it? Two birds with one stone.
Galio: have you met my parent?
Queue times up to 45 seconds - 1:15 mins.  The game mode is sucking out as more find tankie dps is just too over powering on this mode.
Definitely not going to play that crappy game mode. They should just keep URF one for all hexakill TT and maybe ascension
Yesterday I played Kayle. That didn't work. GG rito, thx for making a game where some people can't actually play their main becuase we get fked in the keister by every champ there.
You say this as if using Kayle in other game modes isn't the same. She needs SO MUCH time to get to the point where she' a huge threat.
Yeah she's like nasus, needs a lot of farm to get anywhere (but can really burst squishies down with her event horizon)

Actually, it is because of the guinso changes. 
On your place i would not recommend to even try to build it as a second item.
Thanks XD You're probably right.

So like URF?

And ARAM?
I mean that _is_ what every free game mode has gotten, but it still shows that people are not against playing dominion.

Ouch. That burns.

That said it really definitely isn't dominion, It doesn't play like dominion did at all. :/

I havent played a lot of original dominion but to me it doesn't seem like the update is what "ruined the strategy". In my opinion its because since it is part of the rgm rotation a lot more people see it and say "hey i want to play that" but they dont know dominion strategies so they just transfer their skills and strategies from summoners rift and even ascension
this version sucks :/ i want to play hide and seek but can't really do it cuz they changed the map.

> [{quoted}](name=Wimbledofy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LZBb2B1l,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-28T07:24:31.229+0000)
>
> this version sucks :/ i want to play hide and seek but can't really do it cuz they changed the map.

You can play it on ascension map {{champion:268}} {{champion:101}} {{item:3069}}
ascension doesnt have the stuff outside the ring
Honestly I always limited myself to running within the ring during Hide-n-Seek anyway. Made it more fun for me.
I wish more players understood that there's actually a lane and objectives in DnD. Right now, everybody just sorta rushes the middle altar and starts killing each other.
Or better yet completely make their ultra minion worthless by having a Syndra on your team.  Yeah I don't think Riot thought this one through.
Definitely Not Domion isn't very fun feels like snowdown (where you can pick your champ) but then 4v4 top while one tankie dps takes points where maybe necessary like singe, garen etc..

The matchmaking for this mode has been far, far worse than any previous mode in rotation. It's disgusting. I will not abide by you not taking objectives. If you want to wait in the bushes and wait for kills, go play fucking SR. I will AFK and ensure you lose rather than waiting for you to throw the game for me.
